title: 78/523/EEC: Commission Decision of 30 May 1978 on the measures taken by the Italian Republic to limit the nitrate content of certain feeding stuffs (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 30 May 1978  on the measures taken by the Italian Republic to limit the nitrate content of certain feedingstuffs  (Only the Italian text is authentic)  (78/523/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: It shall not be necessary to fix maximum permitted levels for the nitrates in feedingstuffs.
The Italian Republic shall take the measures necessary to comply with this Decision within one month of its notification.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 May 1978.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 38, 11.2.1974, p. 31. (2)OJ No L 364, 31.12.1976, p. 20.
